My Experience


Education

I am currently a Senior Computer Science major at the University of South Carolina.


Code

My main development languages are currently Python and C#, but I have worked with C++, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bash, cURL, and more...


Tools

I have used Unity 3D, Xcode, Github, ServiceNow, Visual Studio, Atom, Microsoft Office and many others!


Other

Outside of my classes, I am a University Ambassador and I am part of Theta Tau (ΘΤ), a professional engineering fraternity.




My Projects

Oculus Quest Hand Tracking

Objective: To create a Proof of Concept project for Hand Tracking uses on the Oculus Quest.

Technology: Oculus Quest, Unity 3D, Oculus Unity Integration.

Latest Updates:
1/10: MainMenu, Hand Gun gesture, and grabbing fucntionality in progress.
12/24: The first Demo looking at Rock, Paper, Scissors gestures has been completed.
*More images coming soon*


Senior Design: UofSCTourAR 

The project is a part of CSCE 490 & 492 (Senior Design) at the University of South Carolina.

Objective: To create an Augmented Reality historical tour of the University of South Carolina.

Technology: Unity 3D & AR Foundation, iOS/XCode, Mapbox

Latest Updates:
12/7: Proof of Concept was completed in December. Features include Working UI, Mapbox integration, Spawn AR object with Plane Detection, AR Point Cloud.


UofSC Self-Guided Walking Tour AR

Objective: To add AR features onto the S.G.W.T. pamphlet given to visitors who come to the UofSC Visitor's center.

Technology: Unity 3D & AR Foundation, iOS/XCode

Latest Updates:
Image Tracking has been added for the cover, and first 6 tour stop images
*Video in progress*
